Posts.EditableText:
I'll admit, my PC isn't the best. It's fairly old now, still running XP and fair to say a little clogged up.

Despite this it still performs fairly well in most cases, but Quest seems to run very slowly and sluggishly. Is this normal?
Posts.HTML:
I'll admit, my PC isn't the best. It's fairly old now, still running XP and fair to say a little clogged up.

Despite this it still performs fairly well in most cases, but Quest seems to run very slowly and sluggishly. Is this normal?

Posts.EditableText: No, Quest runs fine on my PC. However I used to have an old (2005) laptop with XP and yes, Quest was a little slow sometimes. Upgrading to my new (used, from 2011) laptop made that go away.
Posts.HTML: No, Quest runs fine on my PC. However I used to have an old (2005) laptop with XP and yes, Quest was a little slow sometimes. Upgrading to my new (used, from 2011) laptop made that go away.

Posts.EditableText: Online or offline game? Offline it should be smooth - online you sometimes get pauses between commands and Quest's response.
Posts.HTML: Online or offline game? Offline it should be smooth - online you sometimes get pauses between commands and Quest's response.
